recipesJson.name: One more red
recipesJson.author: vagdal
recipesJson.description:
One of my first mixes was based on this profile. I've done over than 50 different versions but I never pick any of them to share it. So few days ago I've made this one and I'm sharing it because is simple and great for the summer time. 

Edit: I've made several batches to test how they are gonna be after long steep. The longest steep was 3 months and the mix was really good.
